fulltext:
LÊ PHƯƠNG THẢO NHI  
                Curriculum Vitae 
Address:  
Thu Duc District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
Telephone:  
0917 140 299 
Email:    Lptnhi@gmail.com 
EDUCATION BACKGROUND 
Master of Supply Chain Management 
Massey University, New Zealand 
2018 – 2019 
FIATA Higher Diploma in Supply Chain Management 
International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations 
2016 – 2017 
Bachelor of International Business Economics 
Foreign Trade University, Vietnam 
GPA: 3.52/4.0 – Classification: Very Good – Top 7% of faculty graduates 
2012 – 2016 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Logistics Stars Link Joint Stock Company 
Operation Manager 
- Involved in company strategic planning guided by the BoM 
- Coordinated between departments to ensure effective communication 
- Reviewed and improved operational policy, procedures, and practices 
- Examined financial statement, allocated and managed budget for business 
- Recruited, trained, supervised, allocated and appraised human resources 
- Developed vendors and suppliers relationships 
- Managed import flow and procedure in cooperation with other teams 
- Managed administration tasks and coordinated report 
01/2017 – 12/2017 
Vietnam Logistics Research and Development Institute 
Consulting assistant & Research Executive 
- Research tasks: 
Led research internship team to support research projects 
Carried out surveys with companies, agencies related to logistics and supply chain 
Analyzed data and information and wrote research reports 
Assisted logistics experts in research and business projects 
- Consultancy tasks: 
Assisted experts in consultancy projects for Government agencies and companies 
Counselled students in logistics career path 
03/2016 – 04/2017 
ALT International Education Consultancy Ltd 
Marketing team member 
- Created marketing content for digital and offline marketing 
- Carried out market research for new business segment 
- Administered fan page and forum seeding 
10/2014 – 06/2016 
HIGHLIGHTS OF HONORS AND ACHIEVEMENT 
New Zealand ASEAN Scholarship 
New Zealand Government 
2018 – 2019 
Honor Award for core volunteer 
Green Hour Project of UNCESCO – SECC 
2015 
Apprentice Award for Intern 
ALT International Education Consultancy Ltd., 
2015 
The highest rank (Valedictorian Award) 
National University Entrance Examination to Foreign Trade University - HCMC 
08/2012 
HIGHLIGHTS OF PROJECT INVOLVEMENT 
Researcher in Project on Rural Supply Chain Resilience 
Part of Resilience to Nature’s Challenges - National Science Challenge, New Zealand 
2018 – 2019 
Research Assistant in National Action Plan for Logistics in Vietnam 
2016 – 2017 
Volunteer in “Love Letters” Project about education for poor children 
2016 
Volunteer in Operation Smile Vietnam 
2015 
Board of Management in Quang Tri English club for students 
2013 – 2015 
Core volunteer in Green Hour Project of UNESCO – SECC 
2014 – 2015 
HIGHLIGHTS OF SKILLS 
• Proficiency in English – IELTS: 7.5  
• Computer skills – Microsoft Office 
• Research and Analysis 
• Strategic planning  
• Teamwork skill 
• Presentation skill 
• Project coordination 
• Time management 
• Critical thinking 
REFERENCES 
Mr. Tran Chi Dung 
Director - Logistics Stars Link Joint Stock Company 
Address: 39B Truong Son st., W. 4, Tan Binh D., HCMC, 
Vietnam 
Mobile Phone:  (+84) 90 999 3749 - (+84) 8 6297 3988 
Email: alex.tran@logisticshub.vn 
Professor Paul Childerhouse 
Director of Quality and Supply Chain Management 
Massey University, New Zealand 
Address: Palmerston North, New Zealand 
Mobile Phone: +64 (06) 356 9099  ext. 83757 
Email: P.H.J.Childerhouse@massey.ac.nz
